name: Legend of the SPORFE
description:
Battle through an Egyptian dungeon with nothing to defend yourself with but forks and spoons. Why may you ask? To find the legendary eating utensil the SPORFE of course!

Enemies! - Battle the Egyptian gods on your journey to find the ultimate cutlery!


Combat - Defend yourself through the power of forks and spoons! They may not be the most effective weapons, but they get the job done!
